name: Contrast - Aesthetic Demo
description:
A quick aesthetic demo demonstrating 3 different visual styles. 

The purpose of this demo is to show how a simple change of textures can change the atmosphere of a game on their own.

Controls:
D - move right
A - move left
Space - jump

No need to install, download, extract and play.

Created by:
Luke Garcia - Graphic Designer
Anthony Dumbrell - Animator
Harrison Lorraway - Programmer
